title: Graphics Designer (Playable Ads)
job_description:
Strong skills in creating and animating 2D, 3D assets (characters, environments, UI, effects, etc.) with performance optimization in mind, for use in Unity-based playable ads
Collaborate with developers to ensure assets are optimized for performance and compatible with Unity and Luna
Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute to visual concept development
Revise assets based on feedback from developers, marketers, and stakeholders
Maintain consistency in style and visual quality across different campaigns
Organize and manage asset files for easy reuse and modification
requirements:
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.)
Strong skills in 2D asset creation and animation
Experience with 3D tools such as Blender, Maya, or 3ds Max
Understanding of Unity asset integration and optimization workflows
Familiarity with asset pipelines for mobile or interactive media
Basic knowledge of Luna (optional, but a big plus)
• Nice to Have:
Experience working in the mobile game or advertising industry
Background in UI/UX or motion graphics
Knowledge of visual storytelling and game-like user experiences
Experience optimizing assets in Unity
Ability to follow instructions and work independently, as well as effectively in a team
career_tags: Thiết kế Đồ hoạ/Giao diện/Trải nghiệm
